author: ggovi
body:
#### PR description:

We are introducing some improvements on the condition database command line tools:
- On the Credential database ( storing credentials for the access on Oracle database schemas ), the Unique keys identifying Account Name and Connection Labels are turned to lower-case, to avoid the case-ambiguity. Existing upper case entries are kept for back-ward compatibility with previous CMSSW releases.
- On the conddb command line tools, we add the _query_ function to get information about the main data model objects: Tag, Global Tag and Payload. In particular, the _query -p_ function on payloads, will provide information about the boost version used for the serialization.
#### PR validation:

Stand-alone test and unit tests
title: Improvements in conddb tools
